sect1.title: The Peloton Environment
sect1.para: &peloton; is intended to be a cross-platform product, working anywhere that Python and the &peloton; dependencies will run. In principle this certainly covers both Microsoft Windows™ and Linux.

Development thus far has been on Linux however, so the operational state on other platforms has yet to be determined. Notes, comments and observations from the community will be most welcome in this regard.
For installation instructions, please see the Installation Guide.
